Title: Reunion
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Michael Dante DiMartino, Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, P.J. Byrne, J.K. Simmons
Plot: Korra returns to Republic city and team avatar faces their first mission together in 3 years when prince Wu goes missing. Bolin and Varick are on the lam.
